attributes.action: Create a National Free Wi-Fi service covering most cities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: iPod touches. Laptops. Computers, And other electrical goods that are internet capable depend on Wi-Fi to access the internet. Currently only a small minority of Shops, Resturants and other public spaces offer this service. We would like a free Wi-Fi service that will be more availible around large cities.
